cards.title: Build With Confidence
cards.description: Our skilled team crafts top-tier, secure designs with state-of-the-art tech. We're committed to meticulous attention from concept to completion, whether it's intricate machinery or a basic device. Rely on our expertise for dependable project execution, ensuring your trust in our capable hands.

cards.title: Total Transparency
cards.description: Transparency is key for trust in collaborations. We prioritize clear communication, offering updates and sharing challenges. We welcome feedback, fostering open dialogue to enhance mutual understanding and achieve our goals with clients and colleagues.

cards.title: Detailed Projects
cards.description: We've recently completed thrilling projects and seek more opportunities. Proud of our work, we're eager for new ventures. If you require expertise, reach out for project discussions. We're ready to assist and explore how we can contribute to your needs.

companyInfo.description: KGFPL, led by Mr. Sanjay Singh & Mr. Mahendra Singh, excels in technical and financial administration. We have specialization in mechanical installation and commissioning for the various refinery and power projects to the development of a new India.

hero.title: ABOUT US
hero.subtitle: Kunal Global Fabtech Private Limited
hero.description: Engineering Excellence. Trusted Partnerships. Transforming Industry.

companyInfo.title: Kunal Global Fabtech Pvt. Ltd.
companyInfo.subtitle: A Leading Provider of Engineering Solutions
companyInfo.description1: Kunal Global Fabtech Private Limited -A Leading Provider of Engineering Solutions
companyInfo.description2: Kunal Global Fabtech Private Limited (having CIN U28990UP2017PTC096711) is a trusted name in the engineering and industrial services sector, offering safe, sustainable, and comprehensive solutions for fabrication, erection, and commissioning works. Headquartered in Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh, Our company is driven by innovation, technical expertise, and a commitment to delivering high-quality results across a range of heavy industries.
companyInfo.description3: Established with a clear vision to bring reliability and precision into industrial services, Kunal Global Fabtech has built a strong reputation by offering end-to-end execution capabilities. From the fabrication of complex structural and piping systems to the erection and commissioning of massive industrial setups, our team brings unmatched experience and technical know-how to every project.
companyInfo.description4: Our operations are guided by an integrated approach, combining deep domain knowledge with cutting-edge tools and machinery. This enables us to efficiently manage a wide range of activities including tankage construction, equipment erection, ducting, piping, and heavy structural fabrication. With safety, efficiency, and sustainability as our core values, we provide one-stop solutions that exceed client expectations.
companyInfo.description5: Over the years, Kunal Global Fabtech has delivered projects for some of the most demanding industrial sectors. Our portfolio includes successful engagements in:
listItems: Thermal Power Plants – delivering structural and mechanical services and supporting critical energy infrastructure.
Refinery and Petrochemical Plants – offering safe and technically sound erection and piping solutions in high-risk environments.
Steel Plants (Turbine Works) – executing turbine erection, precision installations, and allied works with precision.
Solar Plants – contributing to clean energy projects through smart and scalable solutions and services.
Sugar Industry – supporting sugar manufacturing units with robust mechanical and structural setups.
companyInfo.description6: We take pride in our problem-solving capabilities, especially in the field of erection activity where we have consistently delivered dynamic, tailor-made solutions to meet unique site challenges. Our hands-on experience, combined with a thorough understanding of engineering complexities, allows us to address the evolving demands of our clients and the industries we serve.
companyInfo.description7: The company’s commitment to engineering excellence is backed by a dedicated workforce and a leadership team that brings years of field experience and strategic insight. Safety standards and environmental consciousness are integral to every operation we undertake, ensuring that our solutions are not only effective but also responsible and future-ready.
companyInfo.description8: As we continue to grow, Kunal Global Fabtech remains focused on quality, customer satisfaction, and continuous improvement. Our goal is to be the preferred partner for industrial clients seeking reliable fabrication and erection solutions backed by technical integrity and timely execution.
companyInfo.closingText: We invite you to partner with us and experience engineering that delivers beyond expectations.

bestThing.title: Best Thing With Us
bestThing.description: Incorporated in 2017 and formerly known as Kunal Engineering, Kunal Global Fabtech Pvt. Ltd. is one of the ever-growing companies in India.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: At Kunal Fabtech, our vision is to emerge as a globally renowned leader in the manufacturing and supply of premium industrial equipment. We aim to set unparalleled benchmarks in quality, innovation, and sustainability. By driving advancements in industrial technology, we aspire to empower businesses to achieve maximum efficiency, productivity, and success. Our vision is deeply rooted in fostering a greener and more sustainable future, ensuring that industrial growth aligns harmoniously with environmental responsibility. We envision a world where industries thrive on cutting-edge solutions designed to simplify processes and enhance outcomes. Through continuous improvement and innovation, Kunal Fabtech seeks to be synonymous with reliability, sustainability, and excellence in the industrial sector.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission at Kunal Fabtech is to transform the industrial landscape with high-quality, innovative, and sustainable solutions tailored to meet diverse client needs. We are dedicated to:

listItems.title: Quality Excellence:
listItems.description: Crafting superior industrial equipment that stands the test of time and performance.

listItems.title: Innovative Solutions:
listItems.description: Harnessing the power of research and technology to develop groundbreaking products.

listItems.title: Client-Centricity:
listItems.description: Offering personalized services and solutions that resonate with the unique challenges of our clients.

listItems.title: Eco-Consciousness:
listItems.description: Advocating for eco-friendly practices in every aspect of our business.

listItems.title: Trust and Collaboration:
listItems.description: Building enduring relationships with our stakeholders through transparency and mutual respect.

services.title: FGD (Flue Gas Desulfurization)
services.desc: Proficient in the installation and commissioning of FGD systems for emission control.

services.title: Fabrication and Erection Structure
services.desc: Specializing in precision fabrication and on-site erection of structural steel for diverse applications.

services.title: Piping Work (NIBR, IBR, FRP)
services.desc: Skilled in executing high-quality NIBR, IBR, and FRP piping systems with full regulatory compliance.

services.title: Pipe Rack Structure
services.desc: Expert in designing, fabricating, and erecting robust pipe rack structures for industrial projects.

services.title: STG Turbine
services.desc: Experienced in installation, alignment, and commissioning of Steam Turbine Generators (STG).

services.title: Solar
services.desc: Delivering turnkey solar power solutions from panel installation to grid integration.

services.title: Electrical Work with Commissioning
services.desc: Comprehensive electrical system execution including wiring, panel setup, and commissioning.

indirect.title: Indirect Workforce
indirect.description: The indirect workforce plays a vital support role in ensuring smooth operations by managing resources, logistics, planning, and compliance. They oversee supply chain logistics, maintain inventory levels, and plan production schedules to optimize workflow and resource utilization.
indirect.subtitle: TILL DATE

direct.title: Direct Workforce
direct.description: The direct workforce forms the backbone of any operation, executing hands-on tasks essential for production and service delivery. They are responsible for operating machinery, tools, and equipment safely while adhering to standard operating procedures.
direct.subtitle: TILL DATE

bulletPoints.text: Conduct a thorough hazard identification and risk assessment to proactively address potential risks.
Develop and implement a comprehensive work methodology along with a risk mitigation plan to ensure safety at every step.
Organize daily toolbox talks for staff and workers to foster awareness and promote safe on-site practices.
Ensure 100% compliance with PPE requirements to safeguard everyone involved in the workplace.
Regularly review and update safety protocols to adapt to changing work environments and emerging risks.
Conduct periodic safety audits and inspections to identify and rectify any gaps in safety measures.

certificates.title: Emerging Star Contractor
certificates.description: Proudly received the Emerging Star Contractor Award from Siemens Energy for outstanding safety performance and consistent contribution across project sites.

certificates.title: Contractor EHS Workshop
certificates.description: Recognized at the Siemens Energy Contractor EHS Workshop FY-25 for outstanding commitment to safety excellence, performance, and continuous improvement in project execution.

certificates.title: Best Safety
certificates.description: Secured the 1st Prize for Best Safety, reflecting our strong commitment to workplace safety excellence, disciplined execution, and consistent adherence to industry-leading standards.

certificates.title: Best Housekeeping
certificates.description: Earned the Housekeeping Award – Second Position at NTPC Rihand, reflecting our commitment to maintaining clean, safe, and well-organized work environments across project sites.

certificates.title: Best Safety Model
certificates.description: Received the prestigious Best Safety Model Award from Hindustan Power, recognizing our excellence in innovative safety practices and commitment to maintaining the highest safety standards.

certificates.title: Best Kaizen Implementation
certificates.description: Awarded as the Best Kaizen Implementation Award during the 54th National Safety Week by Mitsubishi Power, recognizing our commitment to continuous improvement and safety excellence.

certificates.title: Zero Harm Culture Award
certificates.description: Kunal Global Fabtech Pvt. Ltd. received the Siemens Zero Harm Culture Award for outstanding safety performance and commitment to achieving Zero Harm through disciplined, safe, and responsible operational practices.

certificates.title: Safety Excellence Award
certificates.description: Kunal Global Fabtech received this prestigious Thermax Safety Excellence Award for outstanding commitment to safe work practices, exceptional compliance, and consistently maintaining high HSE standards across all operations.

certificates.title: Kaizen Week
certificates.description: Honored by GE Power during Kaizen Week for demonstrating continuous improvement, innovation, and a strong commitment to practicing effective Kaizen principles across operations.

certificates.title: Best HSE Performance Subcontractor
certificates.description: Awarded as the Best HSE Performance Subcontractor Award FY 2023-24 from Mitsubishi Power for outstanding safety standards, zero-incident focus, and strong environmental compliance at the FGD Rihand project.

certificates.title: Best HSE Performance Subcontractor
certificates.description: Received the Best HSE Performance Subcontractor Award FY 2024-25 from Mitsubishi Power for best safety standards and zero-incident focus, at the FGD Mouda project.

certificates.title: Best HSE Performance Subcontractor
certificates.description: Kunal Global Fabtech Pvt. Ltd. received the Best HSE Performance Subcontractor Award for FGD Mouda FY 2023-24 from Mitsubishi Power, recognizing exceptional safety excellence.

certificates.title: Best HSE Performance Subcontractor
certificates.description: We received the Best HSE Performance Subcontractor Award FY 2022-23 for FGD Rihand from Mitsubishi Power, recognizing  strong safety & environmental compliance.

certificates.title: HSE Improvement Contribution
certificates.description: Received a Spot Award from Mitsubishi Power for outstanding HSE improvements during Safety Week, recognizing continuous improvement, strong safety practices, and commitment to creating a safer workplace.
